content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error when attempting to execute the "read_file" command to access the alltrails_scraper.py file. The error message stated that the file or directory could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "alltrails_data.txt", "text": "Trail Name, Location, Difficulty, Distance, Elevation Gain, Rating, Reviews\\n\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo snap install alltrails"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best hiking trails in the Czech Republic"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.wiredforadventure.com/stunning-hiking-destinations-in-the-czech-republic/", "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic", "https://traveltriangle.com/blog/trekking-in-czech-republic/", "https://www.roughguides.com/articles/experience-hiking-outdoor-and-history-czechia/", "https://www.we12travel.com/luznice-valley-hiking-trail-the-best-hike-in-czech-republic/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g274684-Activities-c61-t87-Czech_Republic.html", "https://pickvisa.com/blog/the-best-hiking-trails-in-the-czech-republic", "https://www.timetravelturtle.com/czech-republic/bohemian-paradise/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
